body:
I think it is best with only one call: `->append('collate ascii_bin character set ascii')`

Some name choices:
- `add()`
- `append()`
- `custom()`
- `extra()`
- `bespoke()`

Add sounds good.

wrote:

Any chance this will be included in the next version?
@michaelarnauts yes but we need to agree on method name. Implementation is already here https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/pull/11198/files thanks to @df2.

@samdark I think you (yii core team) should just decide, there is no real discussion here; just suggestions and preferences.
Only 1 valid argument against using `and`, which is PHP < 7 compatibility.

:+1:  for `append()`

`add()` can be considered as an arithmetic operation, and `and()` as a logical operation. `append()` looks more clearly in this case.
`$options` is OK as argument but I don't think it's OK as method name which appends a single fragment.
